basic.description: This course teaches the fundamentals of marital and family therapy supervision through didactic presentation, supervised experience of actual supervisory practice, and reflective interaction.  This course meets the specifications required for the Approved Designation of the American Association of Marriage and Family Therapy.
basic.subject: FAD
basic.title: Supervision in Marriage and Family Therapy

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: Passage of Clinical Comprehensive Examination in Marriage and Family Therapy.
